      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String ID, int age, PlayerColor color) throws InvalidInputException
      Method used to insert a player in the game
      Parameters:
      ID - is the player's ID
      age - is the player's age
      color - is the player's color
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if the parameters are wrong

      Parameters:
      player - is the selected player
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - if the selected player doesn't belong to the game

    • placeWorkers

      public void placeWorkers​(Player player, Box box1, Box box2) throws InvalidBoxException, InvalidInputException
      Method used to place the players' workers on the map
      Parameters:
      player - is the selected player
      box1 - is the first selected box
      box2 - is the second selected box
      Throws:
      InvalidBoxException - if the selected boxes aren't valid
      InvalidInputException - if the player doesn't belong to the game
